text: Ajdar Ismailov (born Ajdar Tagi Ismailov; 23 April 1938 – 13 March 2022) was an Azerbaijani philologist and politician. He was one of the founders of New Azerbaijan Party. He was a professor at Nakhchivan State University.AMEA, Naxçıvan Ensiklopediyası, Naxçıvan-2005. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Azerbaijan Party politicians Category:Azerbaijani academics Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people Category:21st-century Azerbaijani people
title: Ajdar Ismailov
